channel.title: CVE Feed for Secvisogram -- csaf-validator-lib
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Secvisogram -- csaf-validator-lib

item.title: CVE-2022-47924|2024-08-03T15:02:36.674Z -- secvisogram -- csaf-validator-lib
item.description: An high privileged attacker may pass crafted arguments to the validate function of csaf-validator-lib of a locally installed Secvisogram in versions < 0.1.0 wich can result in arbitrary code execution and DoS once the users triggers the validation.
